breakoutQueries.name: web-core.BreakoutVisualization.json.communications
breakoutQueries.query: (kind:email OR kind:calendar OR kind:contact OR mime-type:( application/vnd.rim-blackberry-sms OR application/x-chat-message OR application/vnd.apple-ios-message OR application/vnd.oxygen-sms-message OR application/vnd.skype-chat-message OR application/vnd.oxygen-skype-sms-message OR application/vnd.google-android-sms-message OR application/vnd.aos-sms-message ) OR mime-type:( application/vnd.skype-chat-sync OR application/vnd.google-android-sms-thread OR application/vnd.oxygen-skype-sms-thread OR application/x-chat-conversation OR application/vnd.skype-chat-log OR application/vnd.skype-chat-conversation OR application/vnd.aos-sms-message-thread OR application/vnd.apple-ios-message-conversation ) OR ( ( from-domain:PHONE;* OR to-domain:PHONE;* OR cc-domain:PHONE;* OR bcc-domain:PHONE;* ) AND mime-type:( application/vnd.rim-blackberry-sms OR application/x-chat-message OR application/vnd.apple-ios-message OR application/vnd.oxygen-sms-message OR application/vnd.skype-chat-message OR application/vnd.oxygen-skype-sms-message OR application/vnd.google-android-sms-message OR application/vnd.aos-sms-message ) AND mime-type:( application/vnd.skype-chat-sync OR application/vnd.google-android-sms-thread OR application/vnd.oxygen-skype-sms-thread OR application/x-chat-conversation OR application/vnd.skype-chat-log OR application/vnd.skype-chat-conversation OR application/vnd.aos-sms-message-thread OR application/vnd.apple-ios-message-conversation ) ) OR ( from-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;skype OR to-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;skype OR cc-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;skype OR bcc-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;skype ) OR ( from-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;twitter OR to-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;twitter OR cc-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;twitter OR bcc-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;twitter ) OR ( from-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;* OR to-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;* OR cc-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;* OR bcc-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;* ) OR mime-type:application/x-user-status-update OR mime-type:application/x-call-record OR mime-type:application/vnd.skype-call)

breakoutQueries.name: web-core.BreakoutVisualization.json.internet
breakoutQueries.query: ( mime-type:( application/vnd.google-chrome-history-entry OR application/vnd.google-chrome-history-index-entry OR application/x-browser-history-entry OR application/vnd.ms-ie-cache-entry OR application/vnd.mozilla-firefox-history-entry ) OR mime-type:( application/vnd.mozilla-browser-cache-entry OR application/vnd.apple-safari-cache-entry OR application/vnd.ms-ie-cache-entry ) OR mime-type:application/x-browser-bookmark OR mime-type:application/x-browser-search OR mime-type:application/x-browser-cookie OR NOT *:* ) OR mime-type:application/x-bittorrent OR mime-type:( application/vnd.google-drive-presentation OR application/vnd.google-drive-snapshot-database OR application/vnd.google-drive-snapshot-database-entry OR application/vnd.google-drive-drawing OR application/vnd.google-drive-spreadsheet OR application/vnd.google-drive-document )

breakoutQueries.name: web-core.BreakoutVisualization.json.mobile
breakoutQueries.query: mime-type:( application/vnd.msab-xry OR application/vnd.oxygen-export-file OR application/vnd.cellebrite-xml-report ) OR ( ( ( path-mime-type:( application/vnd.msab-xry OR application/vnd.oxygen-export-file OR application/vnd.cellebrite-xml-report ) OR path-mime-type:( application/vnd.rim-blackberry-ipd OR application/vnd.google-android-adb-backup ) OR boolean-custom-metadata:nuix.item.type.mobile-device:true ) AND mime-type:application/x-call-record ) OR ( ( path-mime-type:( application/vnd.msab-xry OR application/vnd.oxygen-export-file OR application/vnd.cellebrite-xml-report ) OR path-mime-type:( application/vnd.rim-blackberry-ipd OR application/vnd.google-android-adb-backup ) OR boolean-custom-metadata:nuix.item.type.mobile-device:true ) AND kind:email ) ) OR ( ( ( path-mime-type:( application/vnd.msab-xry OR application/vnd.oxygen-export-file OR application/vnd.cellebrite-xml-report ) OR path-mime-type:( application/vnd.rim-blackberry-ipd OR application/vnd.google-android-adb-backup ) OR boolean-custom-metadata:nuix.item.type.mobile-device:true ) AND mime-type:application/x-application ) OR ( ( path-mime-type:( application/vnd.msab-xry OR application/vnd.oxygen-export-file OR application/vnd.cellebrite-xml-report ) OR path-mime-type:( application/vnd.rim-blackberry-ipd OR application/vnd.google-android-adb-backup ) OR boolean-custom-metadata:nuix.item.type.mobile-device:true ) AND mime-type:( application/vnd.oxygen-skype-account OR application/x-user-account ) ) OR ( ( path-mime-type:( application/vnd.msab-xry OR application/vnd.oxygen-export-file OR application/vnd.cellebrite-xml-report ) OR path-mime-type:( application/vnd.rim-blackberry-ipd OR application/vnd.google-android-adb-backup ) OR boolean-custom-metadata:nuix.item.type.mobile-device:true ) AND mime-type:application/x-network ) ) OR ( ( path-mime-type:( application/vnd.msab-xry OR application/vnd.oxygen-export-file OR application/vnd.cellebrite-xml-report ) OR path-mime-type:( application/vnd.rim-blackberry-ipd OR application/vnd.google-android-adb-backup ) OR boolean-custom-metadata:nuix.item.type.mobile-device:true ) AND mime-type:application/x-location ) OR ( ( ( path-mime-type:( application/vnd.msab-xry OR application/vnd.oxygen-export-file OR application/vnd.cellebrite-xml-report ) OR path-mime-type:( application/vnd.rim-blackberry-ipd OR application/vnd.google-android-adb-backup ) OR boolean-custom-metadata:nuix.item.type.mobile-device:true ) AND kind:image AND properties:exif ) OR ( ( path-mime-type:( application/vnd.msab-xry OR application/vnd.oxygen-export-file OR application/vnd.cellebrite-xml-report ) OR path-mime-type:( application/vnd.rim-blackberry-ipd OR application/vnd.google-android-adb-backup ) OR boolean-custom-metadata:nuix.item.type.mobile-device:true ) AND ( kind:image AND properties:( ( "Latitude" OR "Longitude" ) OR "Exif SubIFD: Aperture Value" OR "Exif SubIFD: Focal" OR "Exif SubIFD: Flash" OR "Exif IFD0: Make" OR "Exif IFD0: Model" ) ) ) OR ( ( path-mime-type:( application/vnd.msab-xry OR application/vnd.oxygen-export-file OR application/vnd.cellebrite-xml-report ) OR path-mime-type:( application/vnd.rim-blackberry-ipd OR application/vnd.google-android-adb-backup ) OR boolean-custom-metadata:nuix.item.type.mobile-device:true ) AND kind:image AND properties:( "Latitude" OR "Longitude" ) ) ) OR ( ( path-mime-type:( application/vnd.msab-xry OR application/vnd.oxygen-export-file OR application/vnd.cellebrite-xml-report ) OR path-mime-type:( application/vnd.rim-blackberry-ipd OR application/vnd.google-android-adb-backup ) OR boolean-custom-metadata:nuix.item.type.mobile-device:true ) AND kind:contact ) OR ( ( path-mime-type:( application/vnd.msab-xry OR application/vnd.oxygen-export-file OR application/vnd.cellebrite-xml-report ) OR path-mime-type:( application/vnd.rim-blackberry-ipd OR application/vnd.google-android-adb-backup ) OR boolean-custom-metadata:nuix.item.type.mobile-device:true ) AND mime-type:( application/vnd.evernote-note OR application/vnd.ms-outlook-mac-note OR application/vnd.ms-outlook-stickynote OR application/x-note OR application/vnd.ms-stickynote OR application/vnd.ms-note-it OR application/vnd.ms-entourage-note ) ) OR mime-type:( application/vnd.google-android-adb-backup OR application/vnd.rim-blackberry-ipd )

breakoutQueries.name: web-core.BreakoutVisualization.json.items-with-gps
breakoutQueries.query: (NOT (kind:image OR kind:drawing OR kind:multimedia)) AND ((float-properties:"Latitude":[-90 TO 90] AND float-properties:"Longitude":[-180 TO 180]) OR (float-custom-metadata:"Latitude":[-90 TO 90] AND float-custom-metadata:"Longitude":[-180 TO 180]))

breakoutQueries.name: web-core.BreakoutVisualization.json.images-with-gps
breakoutQueries.query: (kind:image OR kind:drawing OR kind:multimedia) AND ((float-properties:"Latitude":[-90 TO 90] AND float-properties:"Longitude":[-180 TO 180]) OR (float-custom-metadata:"Latitude":[-90 TO 90] AND float-custom-metadata:"Longitude":[-180 TO 180]))

breakoutQueries.name: web-core.BreakoutVisualization.json.smsMms
breakoutQueries.query: ( from-domain:PHONE;* OR to-domain:PHONE;* OR cc-domain:PHONE;* OR bcc-domain:PHONE;* ) AND mime-type:( ( application/x-chat-message OR application/vnd.google-android-sms-message OR application/vnd.oxygen-sms-message OR application/vnd.apple-ios-message OR application/vnd.rim-blackberry-sms OR application/vnd.aos-sms-message OR application/vnd.oxygen-skype-sms-message OR application/vnd.skype-chat-message ) OR ( application/vnd.skype-chat-sync OR application/vnd.oxygen-skype-sms-thread OR application/vnd.google-android-sms-thread OR application/vnd.apple-ios-message-conversation OR application/vnd.skype-chat-log OR application/vnd.aos-sms-message-thread OR application/x-chat-conversation OR application/vnd.skype-chat-conversation ) )

breakoutQueries.name: web-core.BreakoutVisualization.json.chat
breakoutQueries.query: (from-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;* OR to-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;* OR cc-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;* OR bcc-domain:INSTANT_MESSAGE;*)

breakoutQueries.name: web-core.BreakoutVisualization.json.officeContent
breakoutQueries.query: kind:(document OR presentation OR spreadsheet) NOT file-extension:(htm OR mht OR html)

breakoutQueries.name: web-core.BreakoutVisualization.json.emailContactCalendar
breakoutQueries.query: kind:(email OR calendar OR contact) OR file-extension:pst
